column5: GOT OUT 5AM THIS MORN!! CONS WERE PERFECT ONCE AGAIN!!! CAUGHT TONS OF BASS (HALF LB TO 1 LB) BUT JUST COULD FIND ANY BIG BOYZ!! FINALLY JUST BEFORE HEADIN HOME I POPPED A 3LBER RIGHT UNDER SOME LILIES!! A NICE 1AND A 1/2 LB PERCH AS WELL!! SLOW DAY FOR THE BIG BOYZ BUT THERES ALWAYS TOMOR  LOL
Thanks for the LARGE lettering. My eye sight is going bad.LOL  Have heard the bass,n has really picked up out yer way. Something about les carp take,n up bass space.LOL  TFS CC

Sounds like it was bitter sweet!  I guess your topic title says it all huh.   You know how those crocodile hunters like to stick their head inside the croc's mouth. It looks like that bass mouth may just be big enough to fit a human head in it! hahahaha   cheers
Looks like a great morning Scott. Those tourney guys  should be shaking in their boots.
any day out is good. nice fish
TX GUYZ!!! I DONT THINK THE TOURNEY GUYS HAVE TO WORRY YET ROY!!! NOT TILL I ATLEAST GET MY OWN BOAT  LOL
Nice job CC.  Great to see reports from ya again, thanks for sharing.
They aint steelhead but still alot of fun!
nice report; your second on buckets?  does this mean retiring from work alltogether to fish year round?
Great report!!! Regardless of size, it'still action!!! Nice perch BTW.
NOTHING HUGE JUST THE WRITING nice to see back copper lol.thanks for the post.
